# init(fileNamed:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an audio node from an audio asset with the specified filename.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(fileNamed name: String)
```

```swift
convenience init(fileNamed name: String)
```

## Parameters

- **name**: A file containing an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioNode].

## Return Value

A newly initialized audio node.

## Discussion

The named file containing the audio asset must reside within the main bundle.

## Initializing Audio Nodes

- **init(avAudioNode:)**: Initializes an audio node from an AVFoundation audio node.
- **init(url:)**: Initializes an audio node from an audio asset with the specified URL.
- **init(coder:)**: Tells you when to initialize an audio node that has been unarchived.
